== Purpose ==

Learn more about C++ and OOPs

== Agenda ==

[https://hirlam.org/trac/attachment/wiki/OOPS/Training201310/OOPS_TC_2013.pdf Agenda]

== OOPS-QG-LAM and general LAM aspects ==

 Thursday morning: 
 LAM design in OOPS (Topics to address)
 
  * go through example what already is done :
  from QG-4DVAR => LAM-QG-4DVAR (mainly work on Fortran level within the existing OOPS framework)
  *  discuss what should be done more regarding the LAM specific aspects:
   (control of LBC in LAM 4DVAR ; on-line change of geometry for LBC; extension zone; large scale coupling cost-function)
  * Identify what acpects can be treated efficiently within the current OOPS design; what functionalities of OOPS should be done more flexible and where new development in the OOPS level are needed
  * a serious philosophical questions : "to see or not to see"
  * installation + practical exercises  

 Thursday after lunch (New DA developments in LAM community (decide which of this questions to address now))

   * 3DVAR FGAT => 3DVAR hybrid => 4D-En-VAR + LAM perturbations (LAM ETKF rescaling / LAM EDA perturbations) OOPS is a flexible design system per definition; what features already exist in OOPS, what should be done more flexible and where new developments are needed)
   * advanced features in DA: phase-error correction, gaussian quadrature 4DVAR, additional regularization (low order norm ) constraints
   * new systems: consistent DA-EPS design; nowcasting/very short range forecasting

 Thursday afternoon: 

   * Coordination and wrap-up
